15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdlib.h>
20#include <syslog.h>
21
22#include <isc/result.h>
23#include <isc/string.h>
24#include <isc/syslog.h>
25#include <isc/util.h>
26
27static struct dsn_c_pvt_sfnt {
28 int val;
29 const char *strval;
30} facilities[] = {
31 { LOG_KERN, "kern" },
32 { LOG_USER, "user" },
33 { LOG_MAIL, "mail" },
34 { LOG_DAEMON, "daemon" },
35 { LOG_AUTH, "auth" },
36 { LOG_SYSLOG, "syslog" },
37 { LOG_LPR, "lpr" },
38#ifdef LOG_NEWS
39 { LOG_NEWS, "news" },
40#endif
41#ifdef LOG_UUCP
42 { LOG_UUCP, "uucp" },
43#endif
44#ifdef LOG_CRON
45 { LOG_CRON, "cron" },
46#endif
47#ifdef LOG_AUTHPRIV
48 { LOG_AUTHPRIV, "authpriv" },
49#endif
50#ifdef LOG_FTP
51 { LOG_FTP, "ftp" },
52#endif
53 { LOG_LOCAL0, "local0"},
54 { LOG_LOCAL1, "local1"},
55 { LOG_LOCAL2, "local2"},
56 { LOG_LOCAL3, "local3"},
57 { LOG_LOCAL4, "local4"},
58 { LOG_LOCAL5, "local5"},
59 { LOG_LOCAL6, "local6"},
60 { LOG_LOCAL7, "local7"},
61 { 0, NULL }
62};
63
64isc_result_t
65isc_syslog_facilityfromstring(const char *str, int *facilityp) {
66 int i;
67
68 REQUIRE(str != NULL);
69 REQUIRE(facilityp != NULL);
70
71 for (i = 0; facilities[i].strval != NULL; i++) {
72 if (strcasecmp(facilities[i].strval, str) == 0) {
73 *facilityp = facilities[i].val;
74 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
75 }
76 }
77 return (ISC_R_NOTFOUND);
78
79}
80
